I had the Black-screen issue, Simply installed directx manually and it got running
for those experiencing the black screen: hit enter a few times and wait a bit, it will then load the game ;)

For everyone who cannot get this to work (including crash):
1. Do not run the autorun setup, which asks for steam to help install.
2. Burn or mount the image, then open 'explore' the disk and click the Fairlight folder, inside that folder run FLT setup.
3. Complete the setup, and when it asks to copy the crack and do the one other thing click yes.
4. Once everything is completed, go to the program folder (program files/a game of thrones/) and run Agot.exe AS ADMINISTRATOR
5. MAKE SURE TO RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!
6. Click two-three times to skip the intro vids, then screen will go black, press enter a couple times then be patient.
7. Play the game :)

The game work just fine,as our friend there says if you are on Windows 7 just run as administrator and voila

If you're stuck at 0% or are getting asked by Steam for an activation key, you need to do this.

Mount image
Go to my computer
Right click on the mounted image (Mine is DVD Drive (J): AGOT)
Click Open
Double Click on the "Fairlight" folder
Double Click "flt-setup"

PS: Don't forget to run the game as administrator.

As WhiteLycanCES say, the installation method is this.:
Mount image (daemon tools)
Go to my computer
Right click on the mounted image (Mine is DVD Drive (J): AGOT)
Click Open
Double Click on the "Fairlight" folder
Double Click "flt-setup"
Don't forget to run the game as administrator.

Thats it...no more, no less, and fine working everything.
